TextLang.Text: Do you want to turn off the system?
Do you want to quit the game?
This setting will be applied to all controllers that support vibration function.
Setting information is corrupted. Press the %e button to repair and restore default settings.
A serious error has occurred. Contact technical support for assistance.
If you perform this operation, you will not be able to go back to PlayStation®Home. Do you want to continue?
Do you want to go back to PlayStation®Home?
The hard disk cannot be accessed.
An HDMI device error has occurred.

Currently, [%1] is in progress.
After the operation has completed, the system will turn off automatically. If you press the %b button, you will return to the home menu, but the system will no longer turn off automatically.
The latest update data has been found. The system will quit this software and start installing.
The latest update data for this software has been found. To sign in and use this software, you must update the software to the latest version. The system will quit the software and start installing.
To use this software, you must update the system software. The system will quit this software and start a system software update.
Downloading the latest update data... It is recommended that you use this software after the download is completed. To check the status of the download, go to [Network] > [Download Management].
This operation cannot be performed during remote play.
